site_name: MARVELS LANE BOYS CLUB, BALDER RISE, LONDON, SE12 9PF
description: The demolition of the former Marvels Lane Boys Club, Balder Rise SE12 and dwelling-house at 41 Le May Avenue SE12, and the construction of 3, three-storey and 2, two-storey blocks comprising 28 self-contained residential flats accessed from Le May Avenue, in addition to associated landscaping including a central courtyard, refuse and recycling facilities, disabled parking bays and cycle stores.
